body:
Hmm, that is true.

Tobias, have you performed any steps to prepare go1.5 for cross
compilation. The tl;Dr is you don't need to and probably shouldn't as of
1.5.
On 10 Aug 2015 8:54 am, "Michael Hudson-Doyle" <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> It's not clear to me from what you say here if the runtime etc is being
> built with the GOARM setting in effect. Could you try "GOARM=6 GOARCH=arm
> go build -a -o ./ts-pi-cc" instead?
>
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/12087#issuecomment-129258910>.
